item.title: Inside Raiders' lost 2025 season: Tom Brady's influence, private meetings and dysfunction
item.description: "Who would want the Raiders job?" The inside story of how the Raiders went from playoff hopes to the No. 1 pick and another fired coach.

item.title: Nathan MacKinnon vs. Macklin Celebrini for MVP?
item.description: The latest poll from actual PHWA voters is in, with some big changes from December's edition.

item.title: Bracketology: Kentucky is biggest winner as upsets shake up top 16
item.description: The new year has brought some big upsets, a shake-up of the top 16 seeds and a new-look Bracketology.

item.title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
item.description: The new women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

item.title: Bracketology: Gonzaga is doing Gonzaga things again
item.description: Outside of that one blowout loss, the Zags are unbeaten -- and could stay that way until Selection Sunday.
